Description: W.R. Grace & Co. and a former subsidiary, Baker & Taylor, Inc., a national book distributor, agreed to pay $15.5 million to settle allegations that they overcharged schools, libraries and government agencies on book sales for more than a decade, starting in the early 1980s. The suit against the two companies alleges that the United States was defrauded in direct book purchases as well as those through local schools and libraries using federal grant funds.

Agency: Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs
Labor Department Wage and Hour Division
Info Source: March 7, 2017 download of a dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Date and year are the Findings End Date in the dataset posted by the Wage and Hour Division, which does not provide case opening or closing dates. The company name is the Legal Name provided by the dataset unless that field is blank, in which case the Trade Name is used. The dataset provides only one address and does not indicate whether it is the company headquarters address or the establishment address. The penalty amount is the total of civil monetary penalties and mandated back wages. The original dataset provides a breakdown.

Private Litigation Case Title: Williams et al v. Follett Corporation et al

Description: Baker & Taylor, Inc. and its former owner, W.R. Grace & Co., agreed to pay $15.5 million to settle multistate litigation alleging that they purposely overcharged school and public libraries for books. The U.S. Justice Department was also involved in the case and issued its own announcement of the settlement; see the Violation Tracker entry at https://violationtracker.goodjobsfirst.org/violation-tracker/-baker-and-taylor-inc

Agency: Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs

NAICS Translation: 424920: Book, Periodical, and Newspaper Merchant Wholesalers
Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
